name: Island On World VR
description:
Game coming soon!!

warning many lights/colors and motion sickness can occur in the early beta!!!

the game is about an island where you can experience the best adventures, 

minigames, drawing and discover what else there is to experience.

early specs:

ram: 8gb.

cpu:intel i5 2.90ghz 6 core.

video card: nvidia rtx 2060 areo >> (one with similar or higher specs).

Warning!

only oculus/meta vr headsets with touch controllers (quest 2 with link is also possible) is possible so far.

recommended vr headsets.

oculus rift s.

quest 2 (with airlink or link).

...............................................

(quest 1 with link not tested).

beta coming soon!!!

please use the itch app on pc to launch the game more easily
